name: Makeup & Salon Dress Up Games
description:
Hey, Little fashionistas! Welcome to Salon Makeup and Dress Up Games , one of the best fashion games for girls. Here's your chance to become

1. A stylist
2. A makeup artist
3. A chef
4. An interior decorator

Yes, all of this in one app!

When you are a Stylist and a makeup artist,

Play:

BFF Dress up Games
Wedding Dress up Games
Princess Dress up Games
Holidays Dress up Games
Baby Dress up Games and...... lots more!

Now cook tasty food being a chef!

Make:

Burger
Cake
Sandwich
Pizza
Cupcake
Donut and....lots more!

Be an interior decorator to decorate the:

Princess Bedroom
Kids Bedroom
Palace Garden
Kids Bathroom
Christmas Room
Cupcake House and ..... lots more

Features:

- All games are FREE. No in-app purchases.
- Create thousands of different looks in each of the Make up and Dressup Games .
- Share your dress up looks with friends
- Save the look as a photo in your photos album or make it your girly wallpaper :-)
- 25 Make Up Salon Games
- 123 Dress Up Games
- 10 Food Dress up Games
- 8 Room Decoration Games

Girls, it's time to have fun! Download the app now!
